ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Cluster analysis via nonparametric density estimation is performed. Operationally, the kernel method is used throughout to estimate the density. Diagnostics methods for evaluating the quality of the clustering are available. The package includes also a routine to estimate the probability density function obtained by the kernel method, given a set of data with arbitrary dimensions.

Cluster analysis via nonparametric density estimation is performed. Operationally, the kernel method is used throughout to estimate the density. Diagnostics methods for evaluating the quality of the clustering are available. The package includes also a routine to estimate the probability density function obtained by the kernel method, given a set of data with arbitrary dimensions.

name: r-pdfcluster

about.summary: Cluster analysis via nonparametric density estimation is performed. Operationally, the kernel method is used throughout to estimate the density. Diagnostics methods for evaluating the quality of the clustering are available. The package includes also a routine to estimate the probability density function obtained by the kernel method, given a set of data with arbitrary dimensions.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0-4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-pdfcluster
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/pdfCluster_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/pdfCluster/pdfCluster_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d510c63ce1825d0acd0204613f880969402c731267b4ff800c8549fd73eda234

build:
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-geometry
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-geometry

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('pdfCluster')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('pdfCluster')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=pdfCluster
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Cluster analysis via nonparametric density estimation is performed. Operationally, the kernel method is used throughout to estimate the density. Diagnostics methods for evaluating the quality of the clustering are available. The package includes also a routine to estimate the probability density function obtained
    by the kernel method, given a set of data with arbitrary dimensions.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: pdfCluster
# Type: Package
# Title: Cluster Analysis via Nonparametric Density Estimation
# Version: 1.0-3
# Date: 2018-12-04
# Author: Adelchi Azzalini, Giovanna Menardi for the current version; Adelchi Azzalini, Giovanna Menardi and Tiziana Rosolin up to version 0.1-13.
# Maintainer: Giovanna Menardi <menardi@stat.unipd.it>
# Description: Cluster analysis via nonparametric density estimation is performed. Operationally, the kernel method is used throughout to estimate the density. Diagnostics methods for evaluating the quality of the clustering are available. The package includes also a routine to estimate the probability density function obtained by the kernel method, given a set of data with arbitrary dimensions.
# License: GPL-2
# LazyLoad: yes
# Imports: geometry, methods
# Suggests: cluster
# Packaged: 2018-12-04 10:41:03 UTC; giovanna
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-12-04 11:10:02 UTC

about.summary: Cluster analysis via nonparametric density estimation is performed. Operationally, the kernel method is used throughout to estimate the density. Diagnostics methods for evaluating the quality of the clustering are available. The package includes also a routine to estimate the probability density function obtained by the kernel method, given a set of data with arbitrary dimensions.
